summary: An email from June 2, 2008, discussing reports that Jeffrey Epstein may have moved significant assets offshore and intends to flee. The sender indicates they will investigate the legitimacy of these reports.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The email discusses reports that Epstein has moved significant assets offshore and may intend to flee.

events.title: Report of Epstein's asset movement and potential flight risk
events.description: News sources report that Jeffrey Epstein has moved significant assets offshore and intends to flee.

keyFacts: In June 2008, news sources reported Jeffrey Epstein had moved significant assets offshore.
The reports suggested Epstein intended to flee.
The email sender states they will investigate the legitimacy of these reports.
